changeSet.author: maciej
changeSet.createView: SELECT s.id, s.dtype, s.create_at, s.last_modified_at, s.version, s.radius, s.height, s.length, s.width, s.created_by_id, s.modified_by_id, u.username AS created_by, us.username AS last_modified_by FROM shape.shape s JOIN app_user u ON s.created_by_id = u.id JOIN app_user us ON s.modified_by_id = us.id;
